channel.title: Rift?
channel.description: Well I just purchased the game Rift for pc and it's installing but I'd like some opinions on it and some pros and cons on game play, features, ect. I've searched the internet but I always get the same reviews and I'd like some actual information about it so.. fire away!

item.title: Rift?
item.dc:creator: @spooty spooty
item.description:
@spooty wrote:

[quote=“Kihomura, post:2, topic:425868”]it’s capped at 50fps with some gpus!

that’s all I got.[/quote]

you can edit the d3d9 file to change what video card it thinks you have. I’ve done that with manyy games

Read full topic

item.title: Rift?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

[quote=“Jayycx3, post:5, topic:425868”]All i can say is ---- “Ehh…It’s aight…”

It’s good, but not much replay value.[/quote]
What do you mean by that exactly? I’ve yet to play the game yet because it requires all the recent updates and fixes so its been downloading them over night (3.9gb) and I’m currently at 2.67gb so hopefully I’ll get a chance to play before I leave this morning.

Read full topic

item.title: Rift?

item.description:

All i can say is ---- “Ehh…It’s aight…”

item.title: Rift?
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

Asked for it for christmas. From what ive heard and seen, amazing graphics. Though im tired of people comparing it to WoW. I mean even if they did or didnt steal something theyre both separate different games. I hear its good though, fill me in on the details please

Read full topic

item.title: Rift?
item.dc:creator: @Uncalled Uncalled
item.description:
@Uncalled wrote:

The game is just a tad overrated, though, all-in-all, very fun - worth your money.
